#summary contentForLayout()
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

==Description==

Used inside a layout file to output the HTML created in the view.

==Return Type==

`any`

==Parameters==

_None._

==Examples==

{{{
<html>
<head>
<title>My Site</title>
</head>
<body>
<cfoutput>
#contentForLayout()#
</cfoutput>
</body>
</html>


}}}
